name: Garments & Ground
description: A full-stack garments products manufacturer website.
details1: This is a full-stack garments products manufacturer website.
details2: Users can register via email & password or google and can purchase any product.
details3: Stripe credit card payment system is implemented.
details4: Admins and users have different dashboard routes, where only admins can make another admin and also can add or delete products.
details5: MongodDB is use as database, Heroku and firebase is used to deploy the client and server side, AOS animation is used.
details6: JWT token is used for extra security of the website.
details7: To see te project more in details please click the live link.

name: Your Fragrance
description: A full-stack inventory management website to update the quantity of the products.
details1: This is a full-stack inventory management website to update the quantity of the products.
details2: Email & password and google user authentications are applied.
details3: React Router Dom is used to restrict some links if the user is not logged in.
details4: Pagination is implemented in the project.
details5: JWT token is used for extra security of the website.
details6: MongodDB is use as database, Heroku and firebase is used to deploy the client and server side.
details7: To see te project more in details please click the live link.

name: Next Level Nutrition
description: A website of a personal nutritionist, where anyone can book any fitness program.
details1: This is a website of a personal nutritionist, where anyone can book any fitness program.
details2: If checkout button is clicked, full detail of that particular fitness programs is shown.
details3: 3 types of user authentications are implemented, email & password, google, and GitHub.
details4: React Router Dom is used to restrict some links if the user is not logged in.
details5: Tailwind css and react Bootstrap are used as css frameworks.
details6: Register and Login page is also included in my project
details7: To see te project more in details please click the live link.
